message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I think $180 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $155?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $155 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $150?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I've made it clear I'm not willing to go below $150, Bob. I think we're at a fair price now. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $149
